subject: TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT
body:
CNN.com - Showbiz Tonight










TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT

THE VIRGINIA TECH KILLER'S MULTIMEDIA MANIFESTO
The heated debate over the chilling photos, video and
writing of the Virginia Tech killer. Should NBC have released
the videos? Could it inspire copycat killers? The explosive
controversy on TV's most provocative entertainment news show.

IS LINDSAY LOHAN IN DENIAL?
After going to rehab
and attending Alcoholics Anonymous meetings, Lindsay Lohan says
she's still not sure if she's an addict, but she felt "very
safe" at rehab. Is she in denial? Are her hard-partying nights
really behind her? Showbiz Tonight investigates!

STAR
COUPLES DEALING WITH ADDICTION
From Nicole Kidman and Keith
Urban to Danny and Gretchen Bonaduce to Ozzy and Sharon
Osbourne, many star couples have had to deal with addiction
issues in their relationships. Why do some marriages fall
apart, when some manage to keep it together? Showbiz Tonight
asks all the provocative questions!

SHOWBIZ TONIGHT
QUESTION OF THE DAY: 
Virginia Tech Killer: Should NBC have
released the videos?
VOTE AT CNN.COM/SHOWBIZ TONIGHT. 

SEND US A VIDEO EMAIL! 
Send your response to the
Question Of The Day on video. Look into your camera and tell us
what you think. Responses must be no longer than 30 seconds. To
send your video email, go to cnn.com/showbiztonight.Watch your
video responses on "Showbiz Tonight" at 11 p.m. ET/PT on CNN
Headline Prime.
